vrpRep.solutionChecker

Class VrpRepSolutionChecker

  • java.lang.Object
    • vrpRep.solutionChecker.VrpRepSolutionChecker

  • public class VrpRepSolutionChecker
extends java.lang.Object
    Class that stores global structure of solution checker. It contains the constraint and objective handlers and the test methods to verify a solution against an instance.
    Author:
    Main : Jorge E. Mendoza (jorge.mendoza@uco.fr). Modified : Maxim HOSKINS, Romain LIENARD, Raphael MOLY and Alexandre RENAUD
